comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This photo is labeled "Engine Room USS G-3" at www.pigboats.com/subs/g-boats.html This conforms with information on this page www.history.navy.mil/danfs/g1/g-3.htm which notes that the G-3, aka Turbot (Submarine No. 31), was commissioned at the New York Navy Yard on 22 March 1915, close to the date on the negative. New York Navy Yard was also known as the Brooklyn Navy Yard and is the site of many Bain Photos. Wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USS_G-3_(SS-31) Exterior photos of G-3 at: www.history.navy.mil/photos/sh-usn/usnsh-g/ss31.htm www.navsource.org/archives/08/08031.htm
